name: Foil Pack Cajun Chicken and Veggies
ingredients: 2-3 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 teaspoon EACH garlic powder, chili powder, paprika, oregano, salt, ground onion (optional)
instructions: Pre-heat oven to 450F. Cut 4 sheet of foil into long rectangles (about 12''x12''). Set aside. Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl. Spoon mixture evenly onto the 4 foil sheets. Fold and seal foil. Place foil packs on a cooking sheet and bake 20-25 minutes. Serve chicken from foil packets. Be careful when opening packets; steam is trapped inside.
